contribution_desc: Ad-hoc tracking and pairing technology between a capactive screen and camera enabled devices. The capacitive screen detects another  device's on the screen through the raw capactive image. It flashes a colour pattern, which is then picked up by the camera and decoded into pairing information (i.e. IP address, port, and connection PIN).
tracking_characteristic: Identity; Location 2D; Orientation; Tracking devices only; Outside-in tracking
use_cases: facilitating input; file and information transfer; phone as accessory for larger surface
